work.name: Workday
highlights: Troubleshoot and implement improvements to resolve Kafka, Kafka Connect, and Kafka Streams production issues ensuring better performance, availability, and reliability

Enhance initial Kafka, Debezium, and Spring metrics to improve logging capabilities, reduce metric volume, and automate metric collection pipeline, enabling proactive monitoring through logging, dashboards, and real-time alerts
Investigate and address Kafka Spring security issues and CI/CD auditing unit test failures which strengthens overall software security and minimizing Jenkins pipeline build errors

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate key features such as migrating Spring application from Maven to Gradle, deploying new Kafka and Debezium Docker images, defining SLI/SLO auditing metrics, enabling automated dependency updates, and increasing code coverage with SonarQube

work.name: Workday
highlights: Developed and optimized Oracle scripts to detect and delete extraneous audit trail data, improving data retrieval efficiency and supporting Aurora Postgres multi database migration goals
Resolved audit trail issues, reducing Java and Oracle bugs and ensuring intended functionality for customers

work.name: Workday
highlights: Integrated monitoring tools such as Spring Boot Actuator, JMX exporter, and Prometheus to the Adaptive Planning back-end auditing architecture
Analyzed and configured essential Kafka, Debezium, Spring, and JVM metrics for monitoring and observability

projects.name: Conscious Investor App
highlights: Partnered with a team of five to develop a full-stack MERN web application to provide investors with data-driven investment insights for ethical investing
Integrated MongoDB Atlas for secure and scalable cloud data management, optimizing database storage and retrieval from Python web scraping programs and supporting robust investment tracking features
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with Express and Node.js, enabling secure seamless communication between the frontend and backend with Robin Hood and News APIs
Built a dynamic, user-friendly frontend with React and Bootstrap, offering simple navigation and data report for investment analysis and recommendations

projects.name: Scalable Backend Server
highlights: Developed and deployed a scalable backend server on AWS utilizing Python, FastAPI, and MongoDB, providing rapid API response times and robust data persistence
Orchestrated deployments on Kubernetes, leveraging containerized environments to ensure easy scalability, high availability, and consistency across environments
Configured and automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions to streamline build, test, and deployment workflows, ensuring code stability and deployment efficiency

projects.name: Website Portfolio
highlights: Participated in weekly critiques to improve UI/UX concepts and code implementation of the projects
Designed thoughtful and creative layouts, components, navigation flow, and animations through Figma and Adobe suite tools before implementing code
Created an interactive and responsive website to host projects using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
